quotes.quote: Passion will move men beyond themselves, beyond their shortcomings, beyond their failures.
Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
If you can't figure out your purpose, figure out your passion. For your passion will lead you right into your purpose.
Chase down your passion like it's the last bus of the night.
Without passion man is a mere latent force and possibility, like the flint which awaits the shock of the iron before it can give forth its spark.
Our passion are the true phoenixes; when the old one is burnt out, a new one rises from its ashes.
Only passions, great passions can elevate the soul to great things.
Passion, though a bad regulator, is a powerful spring.
Passion makes idiots of the cleverest men, and makes the biggest idiots clever.
Passion is the genesis of genius.
There is no passion to be found playing small ? in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
Great dancers are not great because of their technique, they are great because of their passion.
Nothing great in the world was accomplished without passion.
Follow your passion, and success will follow you.
Passion is one great force that unleashes creativity, because if you're passionate about something, then you're more willing to take risks.
Without passion you don't have energy, without energy you have nothing.
It is your passion that empowers you to be able to do that thing you were created to do.
One person with passion is better than forty people merely interested.
There is no greatness without a passion to be great, whether it's the aspiration of an athlete or an artist, a scientist, a parent, or a businessperson.
Man is only truly great when he acts from the passions.
All passion becomes strength when it has an outlet.
Our passion is our strength.
Passion requires focused direction, and that direction must come from three other areas: your purpose, your talents, and your needs.
The passions are like fire, useful in a thousand ways and dangerous only in one, through their excess.
All you need is passion. If you have a passion for something, you'll create the talent.
A genuine passion is like a mountain stream; it admits of no impediment; it cannot go backward; it must go forward.
Passion is the drunkenness of the mind.
A great leader's courage to fulfill his vision comes from passion, not position.
